channel.title: Mobile App Development on Weihang Lo

item.title: Thoughts on React Native from an iOS developer
item.description: About two month ago, I started making a React Native app “PyConTW 17” for the biggest annual Python conference in Taiwan (PyCon Taiwan). The app is quite simple, but still took some efforts for me to build. As a complete React newbie, I would like to share some of my thoughts about React Native. (written on 2017-07-30, based on React Native 0.44.2) Disclaimer: I am a junior iOS developer (about 1 year experience) without any computer science degree.
